group_1.textLeft: ...![chara:102200:effect_7000_attack01]

group_1.textRight: Here we go!
(I've gotten in lots of practice for avoiding ranged@attacks!)
(It's closing in fast...!)
(But I've been in this situation before!)
(I can tell...exactly what it's going to do!)

group_1.textLeft: My...
Looks like she's able to hold her concentration@this time...

group_1.textRight: Nice work, Hikaru! Keep going and finish it off!
Hikaru Army...!
This time, run down the enemy!
ATTAAAACK!![chara:6104:effect_7001_attack02][surround:0001_jump01]

group_1.textLeft: [chara:6104:effect_7003_damage02][surround:1005A02][bgEffect:shakeSmall]...?!

group_1.textRight: Very well done, Hikaru.
You didn't get distracted once,
And you kept your army under full control.@I'd say your training was a great success.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you so much!
How did you go about coaching Hikaru?

group_1.textRight: I made her practice fighting in a bunch of@different situations.
That way, when the battlefield changes, instead@of stopping to think...
She'll reflexively know what to do.

group_1.textLeft: For sure!
Now, I can see how much she gained from this,@but...
What about you, Sakuya?
Yes, you.
You trained Hikaru with the skills you picked up@from the track team...
And it paid off handsomely. Do you feel a sense@of accomplishment?

group_1.textRight: [chara:302101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]â€•?!
Don't tell me...
Is that why you got me to train Hikaru...?

group_1.textLeft: Precisely.
Even though it's not the same as setting a new@best time,
You can still use your experience to help others@grow.
Now that you're a Magical Girl, I thought this@might be a way...
...To give you that feeling of achievement,@albeit indirectly.

group_1.textRight: You're right...
Watching Hikaru's progress up close...
...Was almost as exciting as setting a new@personal record...
I guess I'm pretty satisfied with doing stuff like@this, too!
I'm glad I talked to you about this, Yuna.
And thanks to you too, Hikaru.

group_1.textLeft: I should be the one thanking you!
Now that you've made this new discovery,
Why don't you change the way you approach@team activities?

group_1.textRight: Team activities?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.
Your true passion is track, not fighting Witches,@right?
